Topic.Title: How to preview your game in the downloaded version of Squiffy

Posts.EditableText: Hey, I've just started using Squiffy and I can't figure out a way to fully preview your game rather that the "run" function like there is on the online version. Is there something like that?? there's that "build" button, but it just takes me to a blank link with the  word "restart" in the corner.
Posts.HTML: Hey, I've just started using Squiffy and I can't figure out a way to fully preview your game rather that the "run" function like there is on the online version. Is there something like that?? there's that "build" button, but it just takes me to a blank link with the word "restart" in the corner.

Posts.EditableText: Actually, the build is a bit confusing - it tends to show your last build. If you click the "reset", it should preview your game as it will appear (kinda) on the screen.
Posts.HTML: Actually, the build is a bit confusing - it tends to show your last build. If you click the "reset", it should preview your game as it will appear (kinda) on the screen.
